definition.name: Form
definition.purpose: Provides form context to all child components using React Hook Form.
definition.description: A context provider component that wraps its children with React Hook Form's FormProvider, enabling form state and methods to be accessed throughout the form tree.

children.description: The form elements to be wrapped by the form context.

initial.data: No form state is available until the provider is mounted.

when.description: The form is mounted with children.

effects: Form state and methods become available to all descendants

definition.visualLayout: Wraps children in a context provider; no visual output itself.
definition.implementationNotes: This is a re-export of FormProvider from react-hook-form.

definition.name: FormField
definition.purpose: Wraps a form field and provides its name to context for use by child components.
definition.description: A component that wraps a react-hook-form Controller and provides the field name to context, allowing child components to access the field's name and state.

name.description: The name of the field in the form.

initial.data: Field context is not available until the component is mounted.

when.description: The FormField is rendered with a field name.

effects: Field name is available to all descendants via context

definition.visualLayout: Wraps children in a context provider; no visual output itself.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses react-hook-form's Controller and a React context to provide the field name.

declarations.name: useFormField
declarations.description: A custom hook that provides access to the current form field's context, including its name, id, and validation state.

returns.description: An object containing the field's id, name, form item id, description id, message id, and validation state.

declarations.signature: useFormField(): { id: string, name: string, formItemId: string, formDescriptionId: string, formMessageId: string, ...fieldState }
declarations.implementationNotes: Combines context from FormField and FormItem, and uses react-hook-form's useFormContext and useFormState to provide field state and metadata.

definition.name: FormItem
definition.purpose: Provides a unique id context for a form item and renders a styled div.
definition.description: A component that generates a unique id for a form item and provides it to descendants via context, rendering a div with form item styling.

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the form item container.

initial.data: A div with form item styling and a unique id context.

visible: Form item container and its children

effects: Unique id is available to all descendants via context

definition.visualLayout: A div with grid gap-2 styling, wrapping its children.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses React context and useId to generate and provide a unique id.

definition.name: FormLabel
definition.purpose: Renders a label for a form field, styled based on error state.
definition.description: A component that renders a label for a form field, using the field's context to set htmlFor and error styling.

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the label.

initial.data: A label element with error styling if the field has an error.

effects: Label is associated with the form field and styled based on error state

definition.visualLayout: A label element styled with error state if applicable.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses the Label component and field context for error and htmlFor.

definition.name: FormControl
definition.purpose: Renders a form control slot with ARIA attributes and error state.
definition.description: A component that renders a Slot for a form control, setting ARIA attributes and ids based on the field's context and error state.

initial.data: A Slot element with ARIA attributes for accessibility.

effects: Slot is rendered with ARIA attributes for accessibility and error state

definition.visualLayout: A Slot element for form controls.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses the Slot component from @radix-ui/react-slot and field context for ARIA attributes.

definition.name: FormDescription
definition.purpose: Renders a description for a form field.
definition.description: A component that renders a paragraph element as a description for a form field, using the field's context for id and styling.

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the description.

initial.data: A paragraph element with muted styling.

effects: Description is rendered with correct id and styling

definition.visualLayout: A paragraph element styled as muted text.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses field context for id and cn utility for styling.

definition.name: FormMessage
definition.purpose: Renders a message for a form field, typically for validation errors.
definition.description: A component that renders a paragraph element as a message for a form field, showing validation errors if present, using the field's context for id and styling.

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the message.

initial.data: A paragraph element with error message or children.

visible: Message paragraph if error or children exist

when.description: FormMessage is rendered and there is an error or children.

effects: Message is rendered with correct id and styling

definition.visualLayout: A paragraph element styled as error text.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses field context for error and id, and cn utility for styling.
